segments.text: Man , I'm hungry . Do you know a good place to have lunch ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I know a great place . What types of food do you like ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Mexican , Japanese or Chinese would be great .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I know a place where you might like to eat .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's down a block on the right ; can I show you the way ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This will work out well . I'm getting hungry just thinking about it .
segments.speaker: S2
